editorialNotes.standard: Movings a drag!Relocate tothis satisfying puzzler in which you unpack boxes filled with all sorts of goodies.

editorialNotes.standard: The enchantingly eccentric Rusty Lake series heads underground! Solve strange puzzles in train stations representing different eras of a womans life.

After a long day at work, its bath time! But Swampys shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.

editorialNotes.standard: Put a little boo in your botany by concocting herbal remedies for odd supernatural ailments in this eerie puzzle-adventure.

ios.subtitle: A story of beauty and illusion

editorialNotes.standard: We couldnt wait to go back to the land of twisty towers and uncanny beautyand this sequel didnt let us down. With its striking colours and level design, its even more stunning than the first game. New elements like light beams and controlling two characters make the puzzles even trickier. The bond between that mother and child is what well remember most, thoughtheir relationship moved us in a way few games do.
editorialNotes.short: An unforgettable adventure full of challenging puzzles and gorgeous visuals.

editorialNotes.standard: Search for a missing dog through lavishly illustrated cityscapes in this relaxing adventure game.

Mesmerising from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, youll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. Its a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwos adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.
editorialNotes.short: Traverse mind-bending levels that are structurally impossible
Unravel family secrets on a remote island cursed by plagues in this dark puzzle adventure.

editorialNotes.tagline: Team up to solve the puzzles

editorialNotes.standard: The studio behind Blek has created another amazing puzzle game that evolves into fascinating forms. Theres always something new to learn and youll be challenged to consider all angles of these smartly designed levels. With beautiful minimalist visuals and enchanting sound, Frost artfully engages body and mind.

Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, its as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: A puzzle game in a timeloop.

editorialNotes.standard: Part platformer, part puzzler, Edge has infatuated gamers almost since the opening of the App Store. Guide a nimble cube around the narrow ledges and ever-shifting corridors of a treacherous 3D world, unlocking secrets and collecting items without falling into space. Stylishly minimalist visuals and a slick electronic soundtrack make Edges mix of path-finding challenges and pitfall-avoiding thrills easy to get lost in. Its dozens of levels of perfectly balanced gameplay redefine how much fun simplicity and sophistication can be.

editorialNotes.short: Pop open monster-head puzzles covered with knobs and buttons.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Geneva Hodgson: Story editor, Donut County
editorialNotes.tagline: How deep does this hole go?

editorialNotes.standard: Enigmatic settings and storytelling enrich the mysteries of Leonardo da Vincis gadgetry in this escape room puzzle series fantastic conclusion.

editorialNotes.short: Brilliant puzzle designs and a haunting atmosphere make this unforgettable
editorialNotes.standard: Now heres how you build a sequel! With The Room Three, Fireproof Games kept everything we love about this seriesits chilling atmosphere, mind-bending puzzles and beautiful visualswhile making masterful enhancements. The story continues with trials set by a creepy new nemesis, The Craftsman. As you explore huge areas and tiny ones, the challenges feel increasingly epic, and a better-than-ever hint system ensures that finding solutions is super-rewarding.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Imagine WALLE directed by Tim Burtonthats the weird, wonderful world of Machinarium. But this cute robots quest for love combines tons more influenceslike point-and-click adventures, hidden-object puzzlers, and comic booksfor a truly unique experience. Challenging but full of awesome aha! moments, its an artistic odyssey that looks amazing on iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV.

editorialNotes.short: Discover a memorable story full of humour and charming characters.

name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: It might be time to use your fireplace.

editorialNotes.standard: FEZ begins with a simple idea: you can rotate the world. The more you play, the more you understand this concepts far-reaching implications as you jump between ledges and rotate perspective to get pieces of the world to align. The complexity and sophistication of the puzzles keeps growing, building on ideas and forcing you to think in new ways. FEZ is perfect for anyone who loves scouring every little corner of virtual spaces for hidden secrets.
